data.description_html:
A shimmering halo of energy surrounds the target's head like a crown.
It flashes a spectrum of colors before fading away.
This spell creates a magic crown infused with illusion magic.
The spell's recipient gains a +2 competence bonus on Disguise and Hide checks.
As an immediate action, the creature wearing the crown of veils can discharge its magic to gain a +8 competence bonus on a single Disguise or Hide check.
The spell ends after the wearer uses the crown in this manner.
The crown occupies space on the body as a headband, hat, or helm.
If the crown is removed, the spell immediately ends.
Focus: A brass hoop 6 inches in diameter.
data.name: Crown of Veils
